content.html: Can you please speak to the danger of attending conferences and pretending things are normal publicly? The travel you did, the maskless gatherings - I'm sorry you're sick but why did you think the choices you made were safe and logical in a pandemic?
content.value: Can you please speak to the danger of attending conferences and pretending things are normal publicly? The travel you did, the maskless gatherings - I'm sorry you're sick but why did you think the choices you made were safe and logical in a pandemic?
